articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text commentary from the Billie Jean King Cup as Great Britain face Slovakia in the semi finals in Malaga, Spain.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup LIVE: GB v Slovakia in semi-final - watch stream & follow text updates

articles.description: All the latest news and reaction as Scotland score late to beat Poland and earn a relegation play-off, while Northern Ireland are promoted.
articles.title: Nations League LIVE: Scotland beat Poland to claim relegation play-off & Northern Ireland promoted

articles.description: San Marino, the world's bottom ranked team, made history as they were promoted to the third tier of the Nations League with the first away win in their history - against Liechtenstein.
articles.title: Liechtenstein 1-3 San Marino: Visitors earn promotion with first ever away win

articles.description: Houston Texans beat the Dallas Cowboys 34-10 on Monday Night Football to seize control of the AFC South.
articles.title: Houston Texans 34-10 Dallas Cowboys: Joe Mixon inspires Texans win on Monday Night Football

articles.description: Roger Federer says Rafael Nadal "made the whole tennis world proud" during his "epic career" before the Spaniard's retirement.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal retires: Roger Federer pays tribute to Spaniard for 'epic career'

articles.description: Honduras are ordered to play their next home match behind closed doors after Mexico coach Javier Aguirre is hit by a full can of beer.
articles.title: Honduras punished after Mexico coach Javier Aguirre hit with beer can

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions going into the Las Vegas Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A before Las Vegas GP: Mercedes, Lance Stroll, Monaco, FIA and Andretti

articles.description: Sergio Garcia is set to rejoin the DP World Tour for the 2025 season as he seeks to play at next year's Ryder Cup.
articles.title: Sergio Garcia set for DP World Tour return with 2025 Ryder Cup in New York a target

articles.description: Not for the first time, Steve Clarke and his Scotland side have responded to adversity with crucial results.
articles.title: Nations League: Steve Clarke & Scotland find way to bounce back yet again

articles.description: Damian Lillard scores with 3.9 seconds left as the Milwaukee Bucks complete a thrilling late comeback to beat the Houston Rockets 101-100 in the NBA.
articles.title: Milwaukee Bucks 101-100 Houston Rockets: Damian Lillard leads late Bucks charge
